name: Charon´s Coins
description:
Charon´s Coins is a game within the framework of Greek mythology.  

Hades wanted to get into the crypto business. However, in the process, an unexpected inflation occurred.    Since then, everyone who wants to cross the river Styx has to fight his way past lost souls, collect coins and, if possible, not die once again.  

The game was created as part of Black and White Jam #0.(9). It will continue to be updated after the Jam, so come back for more content. 

Credits to:

Game Design: Rogerio Pereira

Level Design: Voladous

Programming: Ocea´ Ellis

Art & Assets: SenseiLX aka Alexa Steinfeld

Composer & Sound: Filip Bagewitz

Made in Unreal Engine 4
